Hi, I'm Faiz. I design & build

Yes, I'm available for hire
Learn more about what I do.

My Expertise

Following are the major services I provide for my clients.


Consultation

Web development is a huge industry. One can easily get lost in the fog of different technologies and services. I help my clients forming decisions as to what technologies and services they require based on their individual requirements.


Frontend

I design in the browser with HTML(5), CSS(3) and a touch of JavaScript. I love coding things from scratch, but I can work with front-end frameworks like Bootstrap too.


Backend

Along with the frontend of websites, I can maintain the server side of things, too. Expertise include server side web frameworks like Laravel, ExpressJS etc.
